name: Bashing Finish

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Improved Shield Bash, Shield Master, Two-Weapon Fighting, base attack bonus +11.

sections.body: Whenever you score a critical hit with a melee weapon, you can make a shield bash attack against the same target using the same bonus as a free action.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You follow a powerful blow from your weapon with an opportunistic bash from your shield.
